column3: Description
Branch deposits, view all deposit images online

column2: Digital Account Applications - New Consumer Clients
column3: Ability for bankers/RMs to invite new clients to digitally apply for new deposit accounts, including auto online banking enrollment (if selected) post account opening

Card Controls and Alerts       Phase 2

column3: Clients can set Fraud Alerts, turn cards on and off, set and manage alerts, without installation app
Launch of Consolidated Transactions and Spending analysis tools
Reach your banker or  Client Services more easily (Digital Human Connection)
Provide an intergrated and holistic digital bankingand wealth experience for clients
Allow clients to request Wires through Online Banking

column2: Digital Account Applications - Business Client Onboarding Phase 1
column3: Allow  bankers/RMs to invite new business clients to digitally apply for new deposit accounts.  Phase 1 is limited scope with emailed data only (no DCO/KYC/ACI integration)
Allow clients to include funding details within the digital account application, including external transfer capability via FundNow

column2: Updated Digital Experience for Wealth Only Clients
column3: Digital banking log in for wealth-only clients with no deposits
Description
Clients can Turn cards on & off, Clients can set & manage spend alerts, Clients can Set & manage spending limits (Second App download needed)
Embedded link to add First Republic debit card to Apple Pay

Redesigned Add Payee flow, Changed App name to First Republic, Enabled Group totals on Dashboard, Allowed Space inclusion in password, Enabled Transaction Search by Date, Upon Forced App Update clients see support number
Provided spending & budgeting tools for clients to track First Republic and aggregated external accounts
Clients can Enroll & SSO into Cash Edge application to transfer funds from their FRB account to their external account via Mobile and Desktop
Clients see FRB-customized App release notes highlighting new features

Transfer flow design updated, Updated Confirm button for Bill Pay & Mobile Check Deposit,
Improved auto capture experience on Mobile check Deposit, Updated external accounts from dashboard

column2: Open an account button on dashboard
column3: Clients can open an account from  Checking Savings group on the mobile app
Marketed deposit products and enabled existing clients to complete applications for new accounts within online banking (Desktop and Mobile App)
